name: Merge sources in Project by tag
description: Given a Project and a list of tags (optional), merges the Sources in the Project grouped by tag. If no tag is given, all the Sources in the Project are tagged after the sequence of field names and processed. The result is a new merged Dataset per tag that contains all the Sources that share the same field names sequence. Old merges are removed.

inputs.name: tags-list
inputs.description: The list of unique tags associated to each group of sources to be created.

outputs.name: output-tags
outputs.description: The tags of the accumulated Sources.
